reviews.review: Outstanding what marvel has acheived tgis movie brings out every emotion known to man

It was so boring. The plot was weak, the humour was predictable and the special effects were unimpressive. When all the dust has settled, people will look back at these films and think "What a total waste of time and effort"

Move aside lighthearted The Avengers and overtly dreary Watchmen. This is the standard for every superhero film to be graded upon. Aside from a few small missteps, it delivers on every end. The stakes are real but we still have the signature Marvel humor entrenched in the narrative. It never goes overboard but it keeps the darkness in check. Must watch!
An Avengers film entirely comprised of conflict with NO resolution makes you leave the theater with a horrible after taste. Films require beginning, middle and ends....not cliffhangers.

Solid 8/10 movie, great comedy and plot line with the movie keeping you interested the whole 1hr 30min screen time. The conclusion seemed very unsatisfying due to the directors choice in a lack of music. CGI in some parts also pretty poor.
Structurally not sidnificantly different from Justice zLeague.
Meh, it was ok. The ending was the best part...finally.
Action packed kept it interesting for 2.5 hrs. Ending just kept you hanging
This is one of the masterpiece movie for my for my own personal opinion this has a lot of action and the best marvel movie they've made and has a lot of good sense of humor as well as storylines

If you have been following all along this is the perfect climax of the past 10 years of marvel movies. It is the Empire Stikes Back of this generation on a granduer scale. However, with that said, that is all this movie is. You will have trouble following this movie of you haven't seen most of the others and rather than feeling like a masterpiece built up over years it will feel like a movie that is missing a beginning and an ending. Personally it was everything I could have asked within the context of the other movies. Honestly this all would have made a great showtime or HBO series.
